basic.floral_language:
Dianthus caryophyllus
Floriography: benevolent, exquisite, warm
Dianthus caryophyllus has a quality of warmth with long flowering time, very welcome in the European market. 
Carnation plants are dignified and generous with flowers of colors and shapes, often used for flower arrangement, or corsage and headdress flower. It also symbolizes the deep selfless love of mother. 
Carnation likes sunny places, blooms in April- September for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-September, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color dark red, pink, yellow, white

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, but avoid very strong sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
